text.section: Except for an electric or transportation cooperative, a person may not use the term "cooperative" as part of his corporate or business name unless he has complied with the provisions of this subtitle.

A foreign corporation organized under and complying with the cooperative law of the place where it was organized may use the term "cooperative" in this State if it:
Complies with the laws of this State applicable to foreign corporations; and
Does business as a cooperative.
Every cooperative shall use the term "cooperative" as part of or affixed to its corporate name.
